= Introduction =

Here you can see some fimap example runs.
I hope it gives you a good image how it works :)


= Example Runs =

  * Testing an URL for file-inclusion bugs:
    {{{
    <?
      // Vulerable PHP Code:
      include($_GET["inc"]);
    ?>
    }}}

    * fimap'ing it:
      {{{
